content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, nice to meet you! I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment seems very nice and I appreciate the location. Regarding the monthly rent, I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and the amenities it offers. I'm open to discussing a price that aligns with the market rate in this area. Would you be willing to share your initial thoughts on the monthly rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. Considering the prime location and the modern amenities of the apartment, I was thinking of a monthly rent of 1,200 Euros. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your offer is quite high, Mister Schmidt. Considering the size and the unfurnished state of the apartment, I believe there is room for negotiation. I'm willing to pay a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment and the location, but I would like to discuss a lower monthly rent. Could we perhaps start with a figure closer to 900 Euros and negotiate from there?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 900 Euros is significantly lower than my initial offer, Yi-Nuo. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must insist on a price that reflects the investment I've made in this property. How about we meet in the middle at 1,050 Euros per month? This is still a fair price for both parties. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer is more reasonable, and I can see that you're willing to accommodate. However, the unfurnished state of the apartment and the fact that it's newly built mean that I will need to invest in furniture and other essentials. Could we perhaps negotiate a bit further? How about 950 Euros, and I'll be responsible for all the utility costs? This would include electricity, water, and internet. I believe this is a fair compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand your point about the unfurnished apartment and the need for initial investment. However, the location and the quality of the apartment are such that I'm unable to go as low as 950 Euros. Let's stay at 1,050 Euros and I'll be willing to include the internet cost in the rent. This way, you can enjoy a hassle-free move-in experience with one less utility to worry about. Does this sound more agreeable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer to include the internet cost is certainly a step in the right direction. However, I'm still interested in negotiating the rent price. How about this: If I were to sign a one-year lease, would you be willing to lower the monthly rent to 1,000 Euros? This would provide you with a longer-term tenant and certainty in your rental income. I believe this is a fair proposition for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, a one-year lease does indeed offer security for both parties. However, with the current demand for apartments in the city center, I'm not comfortable going below 1,050 Euros per month, even with a long-term lease. Let's stick with the original offer of 1,050 Euros per month and include the internet cost. This way, you have a furnished apartment with one essential utility covered, and I have a reliable tenant for the long term. Is this a deal we can agree upon?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is admirable. I can see that you're offering a competitive price for the apartment. While I would prefer a slightly lower rent, I understand the value of the location and the amenities. Therefore, I am willing to accept your offer of 1,050 Euros per month, with the internet included, on the condition that the apartment is indeed furnished to a standard that meets my needs. If we can agree on the quality of the furnishings, I am ready to sign a one-year lease at this price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful news, Yi-Nuo! I'm glad to hear that we've reached an agreement. Indeed, the apartment is furnished with modern, high-quality furniture to ensure your comfort. To seal the deal, I will have a lease agreement drawn up reflecting our agreed-upon terms. Once you've had the chance to review and sign the lease, we can proceed with the rental process. Thank you for choosing my apartment and for your willingness to negotiate. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
